name: GreatestOfAVAXTrenches
description: GreatestOfAVAXTrenches ($GOAT) is a meme coin born from the Arena Launchpad, but it’s more than just memes. $GOAT combines the fun of internet culture with real DeFi utility. Holders can stake their tokens to earn a share of revenue from integrated on-chain casino games yes, that means actual rewards from actual gameplay. It’s a blend of fun, community, and function on the Avalanche C-Chain.
